interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BABEYOND Roaring 20s Forehead Band 1920s Bridal Headpiece Vintage Forehead Chain for Wedding Bridesmaid Gatsby Costume Accessories with Gift Box
Review Date: 2019/01/15
Store: BABEYOND
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.2 x 7.28 x 3.7 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
Review Text: I got this headpiece as a photography prop and part for my costume for an upcoming masquerade ball. Let me tell  you - this is a headband style crown and absolutely gorgeous! It looks much more expensive, it is sparkley and highly detailed. I love the chain details that go over the forehead. It does not look anywhere like real diamonds - but more like good quality costume piece. My first photoshoot with this crown was a child model portrait session - and it did not disappoint. What I love about it that it is a headband style - it is slightly flexible - so it can fit adult or child head just fine. It does pinch a little if tilted forward, but if worn over the top of the head - it is fine. This can be dressed up many ways - as a princess, flapper, belly dancer and more.. I really love this headpiece and will definitely use it for more creative photoshoots and for my own costume.
Review Title: Gorgeous! Unique headpiece!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
User Profile Summary:

- **Interests**: Costuming, photography, and themed events (e.g., masquerade balls and creative photoshoots).
- **Style Preference**: Appreciates vintage and glamorous accessories, particularly those that evoke historical eras (e.g., Roaring 20s).
- **Functionality**: Values versatility in fashion items, seeking pieces that can serve multiple roles (e.g., suitable for both adults and children).
- **Quality Awareness**: Drawn to products that appear high-quality, even if they are costume pieces—preferring items that offer visual appeal without the high cost.
- **Comfort Considerations**: Considers comfort in wear, indicating awareness of fit and usability while maintaining aesthetic appeal.
- **Event Enthusiasm**: Shows a high level of enthusiasm for events that allow for creativity and self-expression through costume.

The user displays a clear preference for elegant, unique accessories that can enhance creative endeavors, along with a commitment to costuming for various occasions.
